name: ROMECH 350W Heat Gun with 2 Nozzles, Dual Temp Heat Gun 400°F-660°F, Fast Heat Hot Air Gun with Overload Protection for DIY Craft Embossing Shrink Wrapping (Red)
short_description: [FAST HEATING AND TEMP SETTINGS] ROMECH 350W heat gun provides fast heating technology that can reach your desired working temperature within seconds. It offers two adjustable temperature settings, 400°F with 5.3 CFM (150L/MIN) airflow for delicate work and 660°F with 7 CFM (200L/MIN) airflow for large-scale projects.

[SAFETY FIRST] This heat gun for crafting has built-in overheating protection that automatically cuts off the current when the temperature exceeds a safe level. The power cord is UL/ETL certified for added safety. The body of the heat gun is made of impact-resistant PA6+GF30 material and comes with a protective nozzle guard, ensuring maximum safety during use.

[LIGHTWEIGHT AND ERGONOMIC] With its compact size, lightweight design, and low noise levels, this handheld hot air gun tool is perfect for extended periods of use. The pencil-shaped design provides a comfortable grip and allows precise application in hard-to-reach areas.

[VERSATILE APPLICATIONS] The heat shrink gun comes with two nozzles to meet your various needs. Whether you need to shrink tubing, wrap vinyl, create candles, perform soldering, dry watercolors, connect wires, repair electronic devices, or use it as a paint dryer or scraper, our dual-speed craft heat gun with its protective guard and stand has got you covered.
[ROMECH QUALITY COMMITMENT] ROMECH stands behind the quality of our products. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us.
